name: jutting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
sticking out, especially above or past the edge or surface of something: jutting rocks He had a large head and jutting jaw. See
jut
More examplesFewer examplesFinally, the jutting sea-cliff collapsed.He inherited his jutting chin from his father.She was frightened by the jutting rocks and dangerous cliffs.
